resources.string: If you log out now, you\'ll have to start the registration process again next time.
Not yet available. Coming in a future release.
Entered passcodes don\'t match. Please try again.
You\'ve been logged out due to inactivity. Please login again.
Your NAB Flik session has timed out. Please try again.
Email code must be 6 alpha numeric characters long.
Insufficient funds. Please either reduce the amount or visit Internet Banking to update your account balance.
Invalid email address or Australian mobile number. Please update and try again.
{contact_point} is an invalid email address or Australian mobile number. Please update and try again.
You\'ve entered an amount which is larger than the limit of {max_amount}. Please modify the amount.
No requests have been sent. Continue?
No payment has been sent. Continue?
Invalid 4 digit passcode. Please avoid sequential (1234 or 4321) or repeating numbers (1111).
The QR code you scanned does not represent valid data.
SMS code must be 6 digits long.
An error occurred while loading the terms of use. Try again?
Error occurred while attempting to perform device check. Please try again.
Please check your connection settings. To use this application, you must be connected to a Wi-Fi or mobile data network.
To use NAB Flik you must be registered for SMS security. Please call 1300 651 656 to enable and try registering again.

Unfortunately, you don\'t have an account that can be used for NAB Flik. Please contact NAB on 132265 or visit www.nab.com.au to open a transaction account so you can use NAB Flik to send and receive money.
An error occurred. Please try the NFC transfer again.
You must be registered to use NFC.
Please first set a preferred account to continue with the payment process.
You must be registered to use NFC.
An error occurred while obtaining payment details. Would you like to retry?
Unable to connect to NAB Flik. Please try again later.
NAB Flik is temporarily unavailable, please try again later.
Failed to send the request to the following:
There was an error sending your post. Do you want to retry?
There was an error loading the web page. Do you want to retry?
Passcode not enabled on this device. Please login using your NAB ID and password.
Memory full. Unable to save receipt screenshot.
Verification code incorrect. Please try again.
Verification code incorrect. Maximum number of attempts has been reached. Please use "Request the code again" to obtain a new code.
The NAB ID you specified already has a device registered for NAB Flik. If you proceed, this will invalidate your other device registration. Do you want to proceed?

The NAB passcode you previously set is currently locked due to multiple incorrect attempts. You can continue the registration process and use your NAB ID for login purposes. Reset your passcode later by using the “forgot your passcode” link.

Passcode entered was incorrect. Your passcode has been locked to multiple incorrect attempts. You can continue the registration process and use your NAB ID for login purposes. Reset your passcode later by using the “forgot your passcode” link.
Are you sure you want to continue without a passcode? You can still login using your NAB ID and password, and can set a passcode later in settings.
Your NAB Internet Banking password has been locked due to multiple incorrect attempts. You can reset your password in Internet Banking.
Your passcode has been locked due to multiple incorrect attempts. You can login using your NAB ID, or reset your passcode using the “forgot your passcode” link.
User credentials incorrect. Note that you need to be the user who registered for NAB Flik on this device.
A new SMS verification code has been sent to your mobile.
You\'re about to make a payment of {amount} to {name}. Proceed?
Your request has been completed successfully
NAB Flik has an unrecoverable error. Please login again.
The current version of NAB Flik is no longer supported. Please update the application in Google Play.
There\'s a newer version of the NAB Flik application. Do you want to upgrade to the latest version?
You can enable Facebook payment anytime from the settings menu.
Your payment has been sent in Flik, but your contact will not be notified on Facebook. Are you sure you want to cancel?
NFC isn\'t enabled on your device. Please enable in device settings to make NFC payments
NFC still not enabled, please choose another payment method or enable NFC in device settings.
You\'ve chosen to quit the application during registration. Information you\'ve provided won\'t be saved. Do you wish to quit?
Are you sure you want to logout?
You\'ve registered for NAB Flik. Are you sure you want to logout?
You can\'t send an amount greater than $1,000 using Flik. Please update the amount and try again.
You can\'t request an amount greater than $1,000 using Flik. Please update the amount and try again.
You can\'t pay an amount greater than $1,000 using Flik. Please update the amount and try again.
